summary: SummaryDelivering a NEW full-performance formula with advanced skincare properties, Natasha Denona introduces the game changing HY-GLAM CONCEALER.
details: DetailsFeaturesNatasha introduces the latest addition to the HY-GEN collection - a hybrid full-glam concealer with high-tech active ingredients that work instantly & over time to brighten dark circles, reduce puffiness, & improve the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles.A long-lasting creaseless concealer with a natural, full-coverage luminous matte finish, HY-GLAM CONCEALER is made with bio-mimetic pigments & texture-perfecting microspheres for flawless, airbrushed results with a weightless natural look & supremely flexible feel.BenefitsFeaturing a modern, ultra-fluid consistency that evenly suspends a high concentration of pigment, HY-GLAM CONCEALER can be blended & sheered without breaking, flaking, or patchiness.Brightening, Depuffing, Firming, Collagen Boosting, Ultra-Lightweight, Silky & Blendable, Flexible, Long-lasting, Transfer-Proof, Crease-Proof, Full-Coverage, Natural FinishSpecifically tailored to all skin types, this silky-smooth perfecting fluid uniquely addresses any type of skin discoloration from dark circles to hyperpigmentation & acne with an ultra-inclusive range of 50 concealing shades in 4 multi-purpose undertones and 6 correcting shades.Key IngredientsVITIS VITA - Grape marc extract rich in antioxidants & polyphenols with a triple anti-aging effect. This improves cell detoxification, supports skin's production of hyaluronic acid, and stimulates collagen synthesis.VITIS iLUX - Capsicum annuum leaf stem cells with a unique effect on skin circulation for firmer, brighter skin. This activates skin's microcirculation system to reduce puffiness, targets the production of skin pigments that lead to dark circles, and boosts collagen renewal for firmer skin.Item 2608808How To UseDiscover Your Perfect Match: Shade matching has never been easier. The HY-GLAM concealer shade range includes 50 shades and 6 correcting shades. Providing a perfect match for all skin tones and specific concerns, thanks to a color-matching system that is based on 6 overtones (fair, light, medium, tan, dark, deep) and 4 undertones (neutral/cool, yellow/golden/olive, peach/warm, rosy/pink).When using your perfectly matched shade, the concealer will blend seamlessly into the skin, leaving a natural finish, and wears up to 19 hrs long.Work With Your Skin ConcernsMinor under-eye circles/Spot concealing: Use one or all of our shade-matching methods to detect your ideal shade that matches your skin tone best.Blue or Purple Under-Eye Circles: Select a concealer from the PEACH group matching your overtone (P1-P11), or a corrector shade from your overtone group (C1-C6).Dark Brown Under-Eye Circles: Select a concealer from the ROSY group matching your overtone (R1-R9).Hyperpigmentation: Select a corrector shade from your overtone group (C1-C6). After blending in the corrector shade, follow with your skin-matched shade to even out your skin tone.Application: The flocked-drop-shaped applicator has a hollow reservoir, to grip the ideal amount of product. Use the flat side of the applicator when applying under the eye and large areas of the face for fuller coverage.For spot concealing, use the pointed tip of the applicator and blend with a makeup sponge, foundation brush, or a clean finger.The nutrient-packed and highly pigmented formula gives a full glam performance that can also be toned down to a more sheer, natural look. The HY-GLAM concealer can be easily used in the same routine as other complexion products: after primer or without, before or after foundation, and with or without powder.NATASHA'S PRO TIP: If you have creased under eyes, let the concealer set for a couple of minutes after application. Then gently blend your undereye from the outer corner inwards, using a clean and dry finger. (Optional follow with powder).IngredientsShade P1: Water (Aqua), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Bis-Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Isohexadecane, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Alumina, Butylene Glycol, Boron Nitride, Sodium Potassium Aluminum Silicate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, C20-24 Olefin, Silica, Propylene Carbonate, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Fragrance (Parfum), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract [Vitis Vinifera Fruit Extract], Portulaca Grandiflora Extract, Capsicum Annuum Extrac, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Discover Your Perfect Match: Shade matching has never been easier. The HY-GLAM concealer shade range includes 50 shades and 6 correcting shades. Providing a perfect match for all skin tones and specific concerns, thanks to a color-matching system that is based on 6 overtones (fair, light, medium, tan, dark, deep) and 4 undertones (neutral/cool, yellow/golden/olive, peach/warm, rosy/pink).When using your perfectly matched shade, the concealer will blend seamlessly into the skin, leaving a natural finish, and wears up to 19 hrs long.Work With Your Skin ConcernsMinor under-eye circles/Spot concealing: Use one or all of our shade-matching methods to detect your ideal shade that matches your skin tone best.Blue or Purple Under-Eye Circles: Select a concealer from the PEACH group matching your overtone (P1-P11), or a corrector shade from your overtone group (C1-C6).Dark Brown Under-Eye Circles: Select a concealer from the ROSY group matching your overtone (R1-R9).Hyperpigmentation: Select a corrector shade from your overtone group (C1-C6). After blending in the corrector shade, follow with your skin-matched shade to even out your skin tone.Application: The flocked-drop-shaped applicator has a hollow reservoir, to grip the ideal amount of product. Use the flat side of the applicator when applying under the eye and large areas of the face for fuller coverage.For spot concealing, use the pointed tip of the applicator and blend with a makeup sponge, foundation brush, or a clean finger.The nutrient-packed and highly pigmented formula gives a full glam performance that can also be toned down to a more sheer, natural look. The HY-GLAM concealer can be easily used in the same routine as other complexion products: after primer or without, before or after foundation, and with or without powder.NATASHA'S PRO TIP: If you have creased under eyes, let the concealer set for a couple of minutes after application. Then gently blend your undereye from the outer corner inwards, using a clean and dry finger. (Optional follow with powder).
ingredients: Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract [Vitis Vinifera Fruit Extract]

reviews.headline: Incredible coverage
reviews.comments: Very moisturizing and perfect coverage!

reviews.headline: Something is off
reviews.comments: I loved this concealer.  N4 was a great neutral and a perfect match. However, there seemed to be a shortage, likely due to her work on ramping up foundation production, and Ulta was the only store that had N4 in stock.  After waiting a month for my order because Ulta lost it in shipping (and threatened to charge me for it if it shows up and I don't return it),  I was disappointed to see that the undertone was much more yellow than the original release.

reviews.headline: the best
reviews.comments: this is the best concealer ive used it applies so nice and the bottle has lasted way longer than i thought. full coverage creamy smooth blends easily lasts long

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy it again
reviews.comments: Loved  that it has so many shades and I was able to find one that close fit my skin tone.

reviews.headline: best concealer hands down
reviews.comments: i finally bit the bullet and bought this after rave reviews - totally worth it! i am minimizing my complexion makeup and have found that just a few small dots under the eyes and on problem areas is more than enough to get good coverage and still get a subtle makeup look. it doesn't break down throughout the day, but instead gracefully fades like my bronzer and blush does after 12-16 hours.

reviews.headline: Bottle leaks
reviews.comments: I like the product but my makeup bag is a mess from the bottle constantly leaking

reviews.headline: Best concealer I've tried in a long time
reviews.comments: Absolutely LOVE this concealer. I have "grey" under eyes and this really helps tone out and smooth out under my eyes. I also was expert matched at my local Ulta to find the perfect shade for my skin! I have sensitive, rosacea prone skin and had no issues with this product.

reviews.headline: Didn't work well under eyes
reviews.comments: My review is strictly for undereyes as that is the only area I use concealer. Maybe this works better for spot correcting. I purchased as it stated "full coverage." I have dark circles and undereye bags and this made them so much worse. They looked more pronouced than before concealer. I tried it multiple days with no luck. Coverage was more sheer.

reviews.headline: I would repurchase this concealer again and again.
reviews.comments: I have mature skin and that was the only concealer works perfectly on my skin without sink into my pores neither on my wrinkles. I highly recommend for all skin types and all ages.

reviews.headline: You will not be disappointed!!!!
reviews.comments: Works great!!!!

reviews.headline: You want be disappointed!
reviews.comments: I love this product.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: Wasnt as good as my hourglass

reviews.headline: The BEST 10/10
reviews.comments: If youre looking for a new concealer, this is it!! I an a make up junkie and have tried hindreds of concealers! And even after finding this one, i of course, try new ones‚Ä¶ but nothinf beats this one.. and i always remove the new ones ive tried and start over using this one again! I have found NONE that are better! Also, i used this before i was pregnant and had combo skin, then i tried while i was pregnant and my skin was cracking from being so dry, this still worked, and now that im post partum, it still works on my skin!

reviews.headline: Like a clown make up
reviews.comments: It is very thick. If you want to look like 70ies South American soap opera characters, go fot it. It is not brightening, not hydrating, more like matte war paint.

reviews.headline: Like doing calculus to find a shade ü•¥
reviews.comments: Having such a hard time finding a shade - gotta buy several to finally get a good match!

reviews.headline: My go to! I love itüòç
reviews.comments: This and tarte are my favorite two

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Love rhis, i have dry under eyes so i love that this does not need any powder to set. Does not crease

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: Excellant concealer, full coverage.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: This is my most full coverage concealer so its best to use only a little bit of product at a time and add more as needed. It never creases and will look the exact same even after 12 hours of wear. I love using it with huda beauty powder

reviews.headline: Concealer
reviews.comments: Hands down THE BEST concealer of all times!

faceoff_positive.comments:
So‚Ä¶ the shade Y2 is a great concealer with just enough brightening for my pale, cool olive, mature 53 year old skin -with crazy dark undereye circles, that are mainly due to deep set eyes, but which get SO much worse if i'm out late, or under stress - but i digress..,

Until recently tarte shape tape in Light Sand, first the original (god i miss having the taut skin it worked on. It was perfect for me, soooo brightening) and then the creamy bersion, eh, in ever decreasing amounts, then maybelline age rewind (still great) were my Go-to's.   

My friend raved about this, so I originally bought this in the light peach with a coupon.  Totally wrong shade, but i loved the formula.  So i bought Y2.   Perfect.   

I lightly set with my beloved, tried and true Laura Mercier Under eye brightening powder-not-much-of-a-powder :-) and I have no dryness throughout the day, and of course no creasing thanks to this formula.   

One thing i've noticed is, if i do this first, and then finish my face, then somehow my 53 year old undereyes (that are still, btw *cough* well taken care of), look amazing.   I'm not going to pass for 30 again. But thats not my thing either.  I look good and I'm pleased with what i see
faceoff_positive.headline: Y2 is perfect for mature light cool olives

faceoff_negative.comments: This product was gifted by Natasha Denona. I used this on my under eyes and to cover up blemishes/dark spots. The color was a pretty good match for my skin tone, a hair lighter but that's what I prefer especially when it comes to my under eyes. ¬†It blended fairly well with a brush and a sponge. On blemishes the coverage was ok. I did have to do a couple layers most times to get it to cover up to high medium coverage. On my under eyes I was a bit more underwhelmed by the results. I do have the usual tiny fine lines coming diagonally from my lash line but no wrinkles or fine lines around the rest of my under eye. When wearing this I found that it seemed somewhat dry looking even before setting it with powder and immediately emphasized the small lines. After a couple hours it begins to crease around the middle of my under eye which is normally a smooth area. It's a bit like it's drying out the skin and causing it to crepe-up. It does wear all day long but the look isn't that desirable. For me this is better suited as a blemish coverup but I have other concealers that work for both so I wouldn't repurchase it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Made under eyes look dry
